artist: Ryūryūkyo Shinsai; Poem by Wagyokutei Kijō; Poem by Shinkyōtei; Poem by Hōshōtei Yumekichi
creditline: Gift of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
marks:
和玉亭喜常 　「はゝ鷹の　宿れる松の下蕨　なれがちひさき　手にはすわらし」 
新橋亭 　「夢あはせ 辰斎 {Shinsai}
medium: Woodblock print (surimono); ink, color, and metallic powder on paper
text: related to the chs. 16–18 of the Tale of Genji and therefore maybe the 6th design in this series
title: The Chapters "The Gatehouse," "The Picture Contest," and "The Wind in the Pines"
